net.sf.microlog
Class Logger

java.lang.Object
  net.sf.microlog.Logger

public final class Logger
extends java.lang.Object

The Logger class is used for logging.

Author:
Johan Karlsson (johan.karlsson@jayway.se), Darius Katz, Karsten Ohme

Method Detail

getLogger

public static Logger getLogger()
Get the Logger instance.

Returns:
the Logger.

resetLogger

public static void resetLogger()
Reset the Logger, i.e. remove all appenders and set the log level to Level.ERROR.

getLogLevel

public Level getLogLevel()
Get the log level.

Returns:
Returns the logLevel.

setLogLevel

public void setLogLevel(Level logLevel)
Set the log level.

Parameters:
logLevel - The logLevel to set.

configure

public void configure(PropertiesGetter properties)
Configure the logger.

Parameters:
properties - Properties to configure with

clearLog

public void clearLog()
Clear the log. The call is forwarded to the appender. For some appenders this is ignored.

closeLog

public void closeLog()
Close the log. From this point on, no logging is done.

openLog

public void openLog()
Open the log. The logging is now turned on.

addAppender

public void addAppender(Appender appender)
Add the specified appender to the output appenders.

Parameters:
appender - the appender to add.

removeAppender

public void removeAppender(Appender appender)
Remove the specified appender from the appender list.

Parameters:
appender - the appender to remove.

removeAllAppenders

public void removeAllAppenders()
Remove all the appenders.

getNumberOfAppenders

public int getNumberOfAppenders()
Get the number of active appenders.

Returns:
the number of appenders.

index - the index of the appender.
Returns:
the appender.

                java.lang.Object message,
